= List of Triggers =
  * [docsTriggers7plusStart On 7plus start]
  * [docsTriggersContextMenu Context menu]
  * [docsTriggersDoubleClickDesktop Double click on desktop]
  * [docsTriggersDoubleClickTaskbar Double click on taskbar]
  * [docsTriggersExplorerButton Explorer bar button]
  * [docsTriggersExplorerDoubleClickSpace Double click on empty space]

  * [docsTriggersWindowStateChange Window state changed]
